Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
Mirror Image.blurb: When LeBlanc damages an enemy with a spell, she marks the target for 4 seconds. After 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc's next spell shatters the Sigil to deal magic damage. Sigil of Malice cannot occur again on the same unit for 5 seconds.
Mirror Image.description: Innate: When LeBlanc reaches  below 40% maximum health, she creates a controllable clone of herself with the same items, statistics, health and mana, after which they both instantly become  invisible for 1 second.
Mirror Image.description2: The clone can basic attack but deals no damage, lasts for 8 seconds, and starts running 1900 units towards a random place in front of LeBlanc decided the moment it spawns.
Mirror Image.description3: Schism: Mirror Image can only occur once every few seconds.

Sigil of Malice.name: Sigil of Malice
Sigil of Malice.description: Active: LeBlanc projects an orb towards the target enemy, dealing  magic damage and marking them for 3.5 seconds.
Sigil of Malice.description2: The mark will be consumed once LeBlanc damages the marked target with an ability, dealing the same magic damage again.
Sigil of Malice.notes: * Sigil of Malice and  Mimic Sigil of Malice can detonate each other's marks.

Distortion.name: Distortion
Distortion.blurb: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
Distortion.description: First Cast: LeBlanc  dashes to the target location, damaging all nearby enemies upon arrival and leaving a return pad at the cast location for 4 seconds. After 0.2 seconds she can recast  Distortion at no additional cost.
Distortion.description2: Second Cast: LeBlanc  blinks to Distortion's return pad.
Distortion.notes:
* LeBlanc will always travel to Distortion's return pad regardless of distance between the two.
 Distortion and  Mimic Distortion have independent return pads and LeBlanc can travel to both while they are active.

Ethereal Chains.name: Ethereal Chains
Ethereal Chains.blurb: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and shackle them. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.
Ethereal Chains.description: Active: LeBlanc flings an illusory chain in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits and tethering herself to them for 1.5 seconds.
Ethereal Chains.description2: The target is  revealed while the tether is attached, and if it is not broken the target will be  revealed and  rooted for 1.5 seconds and dealt additional magic damage.
Ethereal Chains.notes:
* The tether can be removed with Quicksilver.
 Both the initial and the delayed damage can detonate  Sigil of Malice.
 Ethereal Chains and  Mimic Ethereal Chains' roots will occur concurrently.

Mimic.name: Mimic
Mimic.description: Active: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of her most recently used basic ability, applying the same effects and dealing modified magic damage.
Mimic.description2: Mimic Sigil of Malice: Deals modified damage and double damage upon triggering the mark.
Mimic.description4: Mimic Ethereal Chains: Deals modified damage and double damage upon rooting.
Mimic.notes:
* Mimic will default to  Mimic Sigil of Malice if LeBlanc ranks up Mimic without having used any abilities beforehand (even if she has not yet learned  Sigil of Malice).
  Sigil of Malice and  Mimic Sigil of Malice can detonate each other's marks.
  Distortion and  Mimic Distortion have independent return pads and LeBlanc can travel to both while they are active.
  Ethereal Chains and  Mimic Ethereal Chains' roots will occur concurrently.
 Both  Mimic Ethereal Chains and  Mimic Sigil of Malice will apply damage twice if the original ability's condition to do so is met.
